name: System Security Plan
description: The organization develops and implements a security plan for the information system that provides an overview of the security requirements for the system and a description of the security controls in place or planned for meeting those requirements. Designated officials within the organization review and approve the plan.
supplemental_guidance: The security plan is aligned with the organizationâ€™s information system architecture and information security architecture. NIST Special Publication 800-18 provides guidance on security planning.

rev5.name: System Security and Privacy Plans
